DSP Blockset 5.0 Release Notes New Features Full Single-Precision Support Full Support of Embedded Real-Time (ERT) C Code Generation Smaller, Faster Generated C Code That Requires Less RAM Full Boolean Data Type Support Expanding Fixed-Point Data Type Support New Blocks Enhanced Blocks New and Enhanced Demos Audio Blocks Relocated to New Block Library New Options for Event Detection
